welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Florencia, Costa Rica! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful city known for its lush rainforests, stunning waterfalls, and warm hospitality. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Florencia has to offer."

terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.
